text: Andinosaura afrania is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Colombia. ==References== Category:Andinosaura Category:Reptiles of Colombia Category:Endemic fauna of Colombia Category:Reptiles described in 2010 Category:Taxa named by Juan Camilo Arredondo Salgar Category:Taxa named by Santiago J. Sánchez-Pacheco
title: Andinosaura afrania
